'''Misty Hills, Foggy Vales''' is an [[Event Domain]] during the [[Summertime Odyssey]] event. It is explored during the [[As the Courtyard in Spring Once Appeared (Part 1)|As the Courtyard in Spring Once Appeared]] quest series.
